## About me

In the winter semester 2024/25, I was a lecturer at Hochschule Bremen.

Beforehand, I was a postdoctoral researcher at the [Institute for Analysis and Numerics](https://www.uni-muenster.de/AMM/en/institute.shtml) of the [University of Münster](https://www.uni-muenster.de/en/). I was supervised by [Prof. M. Pirner](https://www.uni-muenster.de/AMM/en/Pirner/index.shtml). 
  
I earned my PhD degree in Mathematics (*Dr. rer. nat.* in Mathematics) at the [University of Bremen](https://www.uni-bremen.de/en/) under the supervision of [Prof. J. Rademacher](https://www.math.uni-hamburg.de/en/forschung/bereiche/am/ang-dynamische-systeme/personen/rademacher-jens.html) and [Prof. M. Keßeböhmer](https://www.uni-bremen.de/dynsys/members/prof-dr-marc-kesseboehmer), cf. [MGP](https://www.mathgenealogy.org/id.php?id=277103).
